name: Condomking
overview:
Condomking.in e-commerce site is very unique and first of its kind in India as this is the only dedicated and exclusive online condom web store. Condomking.in is a new brand website which is a platform for internet users to purchase high quality condom, special condoms, contraceptive products and accessories.

Our wide range includes condoms for men, condoms for women, branded condoms, premium condoms at our online condoms store to provide safe is the mission of the company. With the trend of searching information through Internet

Our objectives

  • To offer widest range of condoms, contraceptives and accessories
  • Quality of the product conforms to international standards ISO:4074
  • To deliver the orders at your door step faster
  • Great value for money as we deliver at the door step all the orders by courier
  • To create informed and knowledgeable users of condoms by having dedicated call centre
  • A excellent customer service to respond to your queries in time
  • On line voice and text chat
  • Controlled blog
  • Expert advice - provide links to specialists & doctors
  • Special periodical promotional offers

Get more details about Condomking.in at http://www.condomking.in.
